mainInfo.title: congratulations!
mainInfo.desc: You will receive a cash subsidy of Rs 50,000, please follow the instructions below!

footerInfo.desc:
1.Forward to 5 groups or 20 friends on WhatsApp (click the "WhatsApp" icon below)
2.Click "Continue" to receive subsidies.
footerInfo.progressTip: Share it until the blue bar is full!

mainTip.content: This event is valid for 500 seconds.
